result.title: Segment tree question
result.content:
Hi guys, I have a question about segment trees. I saw a lot of posts about them but I can't decide which approach is better. I know the recursive method but I didn't try to implement lazy propagation on that.

When I finally decided to search on google the lazy propagation method, I found that there is another well known approach, the array without recursion. I found it on these links:

http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/3327

http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/18051

but I didn't implemented them because I thought it's useless if I learn the recursive segtree. It was pretty hard to find a recursive tutorial on segtree(this is the one I found: https://www.hackerearth.com/notes/segment-tree-and-lazy-propagation/ ) and that made me write to you.

What do you think is the best approach, and what's the most popular? I want to learn the one that's better on long run, and the one that's easy to code when it comes to 2D segtree. Thanks a lot.
